pros: Great hospital to work for! Great people!
cons: Short staffed just like every other hospital in the country.

pros: Benefits, Pay is good, good coworker for the most part
cons: Some drama happens, rumors spread, no time off unless you have vacation hours

pros:
There is new leadership at the helm with extraordinary experience and perspective. The expectation is they are here for the duration 5-10 years.   Lot's of great changes are happening that are positioning the organization to grow, and making it more solid, more fun, and a much more exciting place to work than in the past.
There is unique opportunity to grow your career.
Benefits are great!
The area is spectacular and there is a lot to see and do. It bustles in the summertime and is enjoyed by all the locals in the off season.
If you like nature, wildlife and the outdoors, Homer is a paradise.
cons: Summer days are super long, and can be exhausting if you don't make yourself go to sleep (land of the midnight sun and all).

review_title: I worked at SPH for 2 years and was very pleased with my time there.
pros: Most of my colleagues were excellent people to work with that really knew the meaning of teamwork. Pay is good and most people are pleased with their benefits.
cons: Often difficult to receive training and work in other units of the hospital. Once you are hired into a position it tough to get the opportunity to expand your skills beyond that department. Not impossible... just hard.

review_title: Constant turnover in senior manament and CEO, union enviorment which makes difficult to hold employees accountable.
job_title: Chief Financial Officer in Homer, AK
pros: Diverse community to live in, people in community are kind and friendly.
cons: Too much turnover, either really tenured employees or new. Tenured employees are entrenched in old ways and very difficult to implement process improvement

pros: I loved all the nurses and doctors and the ceo!!! This was the best job I ever had and I really miss it! You get to live in beautiful Homer and work in an awesome job with awesome people. Great pay and benefits. Easy going people with good attitudes. I really miss it!
New CEO gives lots of gifts!
cons: Back stabbing bullying environment. SEE something, SAY something, now your the target of the employees as well as the management.

review_title: Best Quality of Work-Life I have Had
pros: Leadership is people focused, I feel genuinely appreciated

job_title: Rehabilitation Unit Clerk in Homer, AK
pros: Excellent staff, very professional but a healthy balance of fun.
cons: Environment can get stressful, but we always seemed to come out stronger by the end of the day. Very cohesive group.

pros: The employees are friendly and team oriented
cons: Resources on the website need to be updated and better utilized
